page.title: 16HEALTH CARE
page.content: The basis of health care in Hartfield and Coleman's Hatch is the Primary Health Care Team under the NHS.,consisting of a GP, a District Nurse, Health Visitor and a midwife. A larger Health Centre in Forest Row also has patients from this area. The GP in Hartfield dispenses most drugs from the surgery, the nearest chemist being at Forest Row, along with the nearest dentist. Ante-natal, innoculation and cytology clinics are held in both practices. Mothers have the choice of delivery at Crowborough Hospital 7 miles away or Pembury Hospital, 13 miles.The elderly are cared for in their own homes as much as possible with the help of the District Nurse.The Queen Victoria Hospital in West Sussex, and the Kent & Sussex Hospital in Tun. Wells deal with operations.
